channel.title: Posts on 10 + 10 Years
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on 10 + 10 Years

item.title: Loss
item.description: I recount the devastating loss of my men and the burden of leadership after our deadly encounter with the Cyclopes.

item.title: Underworld
item.description: I embarked on a harrowing journey to the Underworld, where I encountered familiar faces of the past and learned the invaluable lesson.

item.title: Reunion
item.description: I am reminded of the strength of family bonds after a long-awaited reunion.

item.title: Finale
item.description: I reflect on the bloody reclaiming of my throne, a reminder of the lingering effects of war.
